page.title: 19LANREATH VINTAGE RALLY
page.content: The Lanreath{Vintage Rally}is held on Easter Sunday and Monday primarily to raise funds for the immediate parish of Lanreath and for local charities. The local primary school, homes for spastic children,including Loretto House at Bodmin and Doubletrees at St.Blazey have each received financial help.Within the parish the committee's efforts have been directed towards the erection of a new village hall.A Vintage Rally is a collection of steam engines,vintage cars,motor cycles, tractors,commercial vehicles, farm machinery and market stalls. Exhibits from the two counties of Cornwall and Devon are on display. The Rally is held on land forming pat of either Chuchtown or Trevalfry farms.
